title: Review: Wahoo’s New Trackr Heart Rate Monitor Promises 100+ Hour Rechargeable Battery Life
content:
If you've been looking for a rechargeable chest heart rate monitor, Wahoo's Trackr has you covered.

author: Alvin Holbrook
